Sentencas: Three kinds of anodes prepared by NiO impregnation, (Ni, Mg)O impregnation and conventional sintering methods are investigated under the conditions of anodic current polarization and redox cycling.
Titulo: Improved microstructure and performance of Ni-based anode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The optimized NiO loading in the Ni0-impregnated anode is 40 wt%; and the minimum polarization resistance is 1.40, 0.71 and 0.60 Omega cm(2) at 700, 750 and 800 degrees C, respectively, due to the increased triple phase boundary and conductivity that promote the charge-transfer process of H-2 oxidation reaction.
Titulo: Improved microstructure and performance of Ni-based anode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The conventional Ni-YSZ cermet anode is less sensitive to the current polarization at 200 mA cm(-2); however, its polarization resistance is much higher than those of the impregnated anodes.
Titulo: Improved microstructure and performance of Ni-based anode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: (Ni, Mg)O impregnation improves the performance durability and redox-ability at 800 degrees C, with a low polarization resistance of 0.93 Omega cm(2) after 48 h of current polarization and of 0.71 Omega cm(2) after 10 redox cycles.
Titulo: Improved microstructure and performance of Ni-based anode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The addition of Mg lowers the reducibility of (Ni, Mg)O particles; and its improved electrochemical performance and redox cycling resistance are attributed to its stabilized microstructure consisting of nano-scale Ni particles distributed on the surface of the pre-sintered YSZ scaffold.
Titulo: Improved microstructure and performance of Ni-based anode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The agglomeration of fine Ni particles is suppressed by the unreduced (Ni, Mg)O in the anode.
Titulo: Improved microstructure and performance of Ni-based anode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Improved microstructure and performance of Ni-based anode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
